      • getAmountTotals

        public Map<String,Integer> getAmountTotals()
        Takes the current expenses and returns a map containing the total currency amounts for all expenses.
        Only returns currencies with amounts greater than zero
        Returns:
        returns a map with key = currencies (String) and values = totals (Integer)
